name: Frogis FA-X4T
headline: Two way 4 inch Mini Line Array Speaker System
description: A compact two-way mini line-array module with an aluminum die-cast enclosure, built for clear speech and controlled coverage in tight spaces and AV installs.
story: FA-X4T combines a rugged all-weather aluminum body with neodymium transducers for a high performance-to-size ratio. It is designed for small theatres, workshops, auditoriums and audio-visual installations where controlled directivity and tidy rigging matter.
definition: Two-way 4-inch mini line-array speaker module with neodymium tweeters and neodymium woofer in an aluminum die-cast enclosure.
features: Good ratio of performance to product size
Flat Amplitude and Phase Response
Aluminum die casting shell suitable for all-weather and outdoor use
Waterproof grade IPX6
specs: Attachment Points: Adjustable Rigging system & Vertical Splay in 0°- 4°- 8°- 12°increments from 0°- 12°
Drivers: Mid-low 1x4” Neodymium woofer with 1” Voice Coil (8Ω); Tweeter 3 x Neodymium Tweeter with 0.5” Voice Coil (8Ω)
Parallel or Series: 6.3mm Socket / Selection Switch
Dimensions W x H x L: 141 x 170 x 162 mm / 5.55” x 6.69” x 6.38”

lifestyle.alt: FA-X4T mini line array module front view
lifestyle.caption: A compact, all-weather mini array module for clean coverage in tight architectural spaces.

name: Frogis FA-2X6T
headline: High Performance Dual 6-inch Line Array Speakers
description: A stainless-steel line-array module built for wide coverage and high output, pairing dual 6-inch neodymium low-mid drivers with dual 1-inch neodymium HF drivers for touring or installed systems.
story: FA-2X6T is engineered for theatres, concert halls, clubs, churches and tight-space reinforcement where wide horizontal coverage and scalable rigging are key. Its 304 stainless steel shell supports all-weather use, while presets and selectable coverage enable adaptable deployment.
definition: High-performance dual 6-inch line-array speaker module with 304 stainless-steel enclosure and built-in crossover.
drivers: 2×6” neodymium low-mid + 2×0.5” neodymium compression drivers (1” coil)
features: Good ratio of performance to product size
Flat Amplitude and Phase Response
Built-in 35mm bracket mounting holes
304 stainless steel shell, suitable for all-weather and outdoor use
Waterproof grade IPX6
applications: Movie surround sound and effects enhancement
specs: Maximum SPL: 125 dB continuous - 131 dB peak
Coverage: Horizontal 130° / Vectical selectable from 10° to 130°
Mid-low Driver（Impedance）: 2 x 6” Neodymium speaker 2.5” coil （4Ω）
Tweeter（Impedance）: 2 x 0.5” Neodymium compression driver 1” coil （8Ω）
Max Power: Mid-low Driver：2x500 W; Tweeter：2x80W
Rated Power: Mid-low Driver：2x250 W; Tweeter：2x40W
Dimensions W x H x L: 17.5 x 51 x 19 cm (6.89”x 20.08”x 7.48”)

lifestyle.caption: 304 stainless steel construction with wide horizontal coverage for scalable touring or installed systems.

name: Frogis FA-2X10S
headline: High Performance Dual 10-inch Array Subwoofer
description: A compact, high-performance dual 10-inch array subwoofer in a 304 stainless-steel chassis—tuned to pair with FA-2X6T and other small-to-medium full-range systems for touring or installs.
story: FA-2X10S uses dual 10-inch neodymium transducers engineered for maximum linear excursion, with large-area porting to reduce turbulence and noise. It is ideal for theatres, concert halls, AV installations, stadiums and outdoor theme parks where controlled sub-bass is required.
definition: Dual 10-inch neodymium array subwoofer designed to complement FA series line-array tops.
features: Good ratio of performance to product size
Equipped with line array rigging accessories
Built-in 35mm bracket mounting holes
Direct and long excursion 10-inch driver
304 stainless steel shell, suitable for all-weather and outdoor use
Waterproof grade IPX6
specs: Maximum SPL: 125 dB continuous - 131 dB peak
LF driver（Impedance）: 2 x 10” Neodymium speaker 2.5” Coil （8Ω）
Dimensions W x H x L: 49.8 x 33.6 x 28 cm (19.6”x 13.2”x 10.9”)

lifestyle.caption: Dual 10-inch neodymium sub-bass in a compact stainless chassis—built for touring and installed array systems.

name: Frogis FA-3X10T
headline: Dual 10 inch three-way eight-driver line array Speaker
description: A three-way, dual 10-inch professional line-array cabinet with eight drivers—built to deliver high output, balanced detail, and uniform coverage in large-scale reinforcement.
story: FA-3X10T is configured with dual 10-inch carbon-fiber neodymium woofers for impactful low end, four 4.5-inch neodymium mid drivers for body and clarity, and dual 1-inch titanium diaphragm neodymium compression drivers for crisp highs. Cabinet geometry and driver positioning are optimised to reduce system delay and improve phase alignment for a more natural listening experience.
definition: Three-way dual 10-inch line-array cabinet with 2×10” LF, 4×4.5” MF and 2×1” HF neodymium drivers.
features: Two 44mm titanium diaphragm neodymium magnet compression drivers with good transient response and low distortion, reducing listening fatigue
Four 4.5-inch neodymium magnet mid-range units with ported structure to improve heat dissipation and mid-range damping for clearer, more natural mids
Two 10-inch neodymium magnet carbon fiber woofers redeveloped for lower distortion and strong transient response with clean, elastic low end
Tweeter and mid-range physical positions readjusted to reduce overall system delay and improve phase for a more natural listening experience
specs: Woofer Unit: Neodymium magnet, 2×10” carbon fiber woofer with 75mm voice coil
Mid-range unit: Neodymium magnet, 4×4.5” mid-range unit with 25mm voice coil
Tweeter Unit: Neodymium magnet, 2×1” titanium diaphragm tweeter with 44mm voice coil
Maximum Sound Pressure Level (SPL): LF: 127dB / MF: 120dB / HF: 131dB
Hanging Hardware: Three-point hanging, adjustable from 0° to 10°

lifestyle.alt: FA-3X10T three-way dual 10-inch line array cabinet
lifestyle.caption: A three-way architecture tuned for large rooms—impactful lows, articulate mids, and bright, controlled highs.

name: Frogis FA-SUB21P
headline: High Performance Subwoofer
description: A high-power 21-inch subwoofer designed to match FA series line arrays and other mid-to-large full-range systems, delivering deep, high-output bass for large venues and outdoor events.
story: FA-SUB21P uses a 21-inch ultra-long excursion driver with a 4-inch voice coil, housed in a structurally reinforced cabinet with symmetrical rear loading and triangular ports to minimise turbulence and cabinet resonance. It is built for stadiums, theatres, concert halls, churches, touring and large-scale outdoor activities.
definition: High-performance 21-inch subwoofer with ultra-long excursion driver and high output capability.
features: Good ratio of performance to product size
Smooth and streamlined exterior design
Equipped with rigging and stacking accessories
High-quality components with outstanding performance
Compatible with FROG-IS line array speakers (FA-2X6T, FA-2X10S) and other point source speakers
specs: Maximum SPL: 131 dB continuous - 137 dB peak
LF-Driver（Imoedance）: 1X21" ceramic magnet speaker 4" voice coil
Dimensions W x H x L: 60 x 60 x 85 cm (23.62” x 23.62” x 33.46”)

lifestyle.caption: A 21-inch high-power foundation designed for stadium-scale low end and touring reliability.
